hero_banner_description: Maximize your productivity and reduce time wastage with our efficient solutions.
customizable_heading: Offering a range of forms to suit your needs
customizable_description: Choose from our range of forms, designed to meet your specific needs.
fml_description: The FML is part of the CBBS, the claim assessment and assurance system of the UWV. This system is used by insurance physicians and occupational experts at the UWV for claim assessments under the disability laws in the Netherlands.
kfml_description: The FML systematically indicates the extent, frequency, and/or working hours per day an employee is capable of. The employee's work capacity is compared to the demands of the job to assess whether the employee is suitable for the position.
form_solutions_description: Are you handling forms that require manual effort? Contact us to discover how IQB can streamline your process. Our solution effortlessly transforms forms into PDF or MS Word reports, automating your workflow and saving valuable time. Let's simplify your tasks together.
about_iqb_heading: Get acquainted with our IQB tool
about_iqb_description: IQB is a tool designed to simplify and streamline the process of creating professional and smart forms for busy professionals like you. We understand that your time is valuable, which is why we developed IQB as your optimal solution for creating smarter, more efficient forms. An example of an IQB form is the KFML form.
about_iqb_details:
• Your FML normal answers are already pre-filled.
  • You can easily navigate back and forth between the sections of the FML.
  • Did you make a mistake? Just fix it and regenerate the report again.
  • Compose an FML, proceed with a single click directly to a fully completed (K)FML, and generate the report.
  • Complete a (K)FML in less than 10 minutes and save time for other enjoyable expertise.
  • You can request your own colours/style for the login and the FML report.

faq_heading: Unanswered questions that may pique your interest
faq_description: Whether you're looking for more details about the tool's features or need help troubleshooting, you'll find everything you need to get the most out of IQB Tool right here.

faq.faq_question: How can I analyze the data I submitted through my questionnaire form?
faq.faq_answer: You can analyze your data using IQB Tool’s analytics dashboard, which provides detailed insights and allows you to export and visualize responses. For deeper analysis, data export options are available.

faq.faq_question: How do I customize my form?
faq.faq_answer: Easily customize your form with our drag-and-drop editor. Modify design, fields, and settings like conditional logic, or add custom CSS for advanced customization.

faq.faq_question: Why would someone use a questionnaire form?
faq.faq_answer: Questionnaire forms are ideal for gathering structured data, such as feedback or registrations. IQB Tool simplifies the process with smart forms that are easy to create and personalize.

faq.faq_question: What occurs when I surpass the monthly submission threshold?
faq.faq_answer: Exceeding the submission limit? Don’t worry—extra submissions are securely stored, and you can access them by upgrading your plan.

IQB is a tool designed to simplify and streamline the process of creating professional and smart forms for busy professionals like you. We understand that your time is valuable, which is why we developed IQB as your optimal solution for creating smarter, more efficient forms. An example of an IQB form is the KFML form.

pricing_description: Price that follow the growth of your business, so you will never be paying more you need.
trialPlan_description: Enjoy the ease of creating your own (K)FML.
trialPlan_details:
• 1 User
  • Access basic form & limited questionnaire features
  • Email support for essential queries
  • Fair use policy applies
personalPlan_description: Ideal for those who frequently create (K)FMLs.
personalPlan_details:
• 1 User
  • Includes 1 (K)FML per month
  • Access advanced form and pro questionnaire features
  • Email support for essential queries
  • Fair use policy applies
  • Email support for essential queries
  • Generate PDFs reports with your brand identify
businessPlan_description: For more than 2 users, contact us to explore your options.
businessPlan_details:
• At least 2 users
  • Unlimited (K)FML creation per month
  • Access advanced form and pro questionnaire features
  • Priority email for essential queries
  • Fair use policy applies
  • Email support for essential queries
  • Generate PDFs reports with your brand identify
  • Advanced reporting and analytics
customPlan_description: Only create a few (K)FMLs per quarter or year? Contact us for a custom quote.
customPlan_details:
• One or multiple users
  • Custom-built (K)FML solutions to match your requirements
